Egwuregwu Olympic ma ọ bụ Olympic nke oge a (French: Jeux olympiques) [lower-alpha 1]  bụ ndị isi egwuregwu egwuregwu mba ụwa na-egosi asọmpi egwuregwu okpomọkụ na oyi nke ọtụtụ puku ndị na-eme egwuregwu si gburugburu ụwa na-ekere òkè n'asọmpi dị iche iche.  A na-ewere egwuregwu Olympic dị ka asọmpi egwuregwu kachasị n'ụwa nwere ihe karịrị otu narị abụọ, na-anọchite anya steeti na ókèala ndị nweburu, na-esonye.  A na-eme egwuregwu Olympic kwa afọ anọ, na kemgbe 1994, na-agbanwe n'etiti oge okpomọkụ na oge oyi kwa afọ abụọ n'ime afọ anọ.
